patthana13.5:5.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:5.2: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:5.3: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:5.4: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:5.5: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.5:6.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:6.2: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:6.3: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.5:7.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:7.2: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:7.3: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:7.4: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:7.5: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.5:8.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.5:9.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … tīṇi.
patthana13.5:10.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke ekādasa … pe … avigate ekūnavīsa.
patthana13.5:10.6: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ. Pañhāvāre na sadisaṃ.)
patthana13.5:11.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, anantare soḷasa … pe … sahajāte ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye sattarasa, purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane aṭṭha, kamme terasa, vipāke aṭṭha, āhāre terasa … pe … magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa … pe … avigate chabbīsa.
